title: Comparison of forces exerted by racket and ball

content.prompt: How does the magnitude of the average force exerted by the ball on the racket compare to the magnitude of the average force exerted by the racket on the ball?

choices.label: It cannot be determined without knowing the mass of the racket.
It cannot be determined without knowing the recoil speed of the racket.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
